artist: Artist: Carri Skoczek; Author: Tsaurah Litzky; Publisher: Low Tech Press, Long Island City, N.Y.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical image of linoleum block print with letterpress text printed in offset lithography on beige paper covers; 24 pp.
inscription: title page, black ink pen: For Fly / venceremos! / Tsaurah
title: Good Bye Beautiful Mother
